english.segment1: mothership come and. take me home. cannot stand. to be alone. mothership come and. take me home
english.segment2: waiting for my ship to come in. there's an empty void. between You and me. needing Your Spirit now. set all aside. to keep my vows
english.segment3: waiting for my ride to stop by. I'm alive, staring at the sky. needing Your Spirit here. Your word is Truth. the time is near
english.segment4: on a starry night. I call for You. Jesus
english.segment6: waiting. for my Savior to come. across empty skies. will I see the Son. tonight
